articles.content: (Reuters) - Googles iPhone apps such as Maps and YouTube will stop using a tool from Apple Inc that allows them to personalize ads, avoiding a new Apple warning that informs users their browsing is b… [+2001 chars]

articles.title: Firefox 85 is Here, But Mozilla is Killing PWA Features - Thurrott.com - Thurrott.com
articles.description: Mozilla released Firefox 85 this week, adding protections against so-called supercookies. But it’s also taking a major step back from PWAs.
articles.content: Mozilla released Firefox 85 this week, adding protections against so-called supercookies. But its also taking a major step back from Progressive Web Apps (PWAs), which makes this browser a lot less i… [+2285 chars]

articles.title: The Morning After: Sony's $6,500 A1 camera has a matching $2,500 smartphone - Engadget
articles.description: Sony's new pro equipment builds a mobile broadcast studio, and Apple's latest iOS 14 update includes key security fixes.
articles.content: Sony unveiled two pro-level devices yesterday, starting with a $2,500 smartphone (no, it doesn’t fold or roll up). Teased in early 2020, the Xperia Pro is for video professionals working in the field… [+4208 chars]

articles.author: Clare Duffy, CNN Business
articles.title: Microsoft patented a chatbot that would let you talk to dead people. It was too disturbing for production - CNN
articles.description: The internet is buzzing over a new technology created by Microsoft developers that could make it possible to have a virtual conversation with a deceased loved one (well, kind of).
